trans-unit.source: Azure AD Connect sync: Synchronization Service Manager UI | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Azure AD Connect sync: Synchronization Service Manager UI | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Understand the Metaverse Search tab in the Synchronization Service Manager for Azure AD Connect.
trans-unit.target: Understand the Metaverse Search tab in the Synchronization Service Manager for Azure AD Connect.

trans-unit.source: Azure AD Connect sync: Synchronization Service Manager
trans-unit.target: Azure AD Connect sync: Synchronization Service Manager

trans-unit.source: The metaverse search tab is useful for troubleshooting data related problems.
trans-unit.target: The metaverse search tab is useful for troubleshooting data related problems.

trans-unit.source: In the top half you can create a query based on a combination of attributes.
trans-unit.target: In the top half you can create a query based on a combination of attributes.

trans-unit.source: When you are satisfied with your query, click on **Search**.
trans-unit.target: When you are satisfied with your query, click on **Search**.

trans-unit.source: The result will be visible in the bottom grid.
trans-unit.target: The result will be visible in the bottom grid.

trans-unit.source: You can select which columns should be visible with **Column Settings**.
trans-unit.target: You can select which columns should be visible with **Column Settings**.

trans-unit.source: In the search results, select an object and **Properties** to see the [metaverse object properties](active-directory-aadconnectsync-service-manager-ui-connectors.md#metaverse-object-properties).
trans-unit.target: In the search results, select an object and **Properties** to see the [metaverse object properties](active-directory-aadconnectsync-service-manager-ui-connectors.md#metaverse-object-properties).

trans-unit.source: Learn more about the [Azure AD Connect sync](active-directory-aadconnectsync-whatis.md) configuration.
trans-unit.target: Learn more about the [Azure AD Connect sync](active-directory-aadconnectsync-whatis.md) configuration.

trans-unit.source: Learn more about [Integrating your on-premises identities with Azure Active Directory](active-directory-aadconnect.md).
trans-unit.target: Learn more about [Integrating your on-premises identities with Azure Active Directory](active-directory-aadconnect.md).
